metadata.name: Equality.
metadata.description:
The equality that everyone has is death. But everyone can choose to live their life with the greatest benefit. before death takes us from this world. 

About work.

This picture is divided into three parts. 
The first part is the background. There are many stories that we have encountered in our whole lives. The second part is living with purpose. at the top of the picture I used the image of the Emperor God for the ten good deeds. These are the ten good qualities that guide life. 
The third part is the skull to limit the area of ​​life to the end of death. 
You can choose how you will live this life. 

Technique : Fountain pen on paper. 
Size : A3 
April 2022. 

Thank you very much.
